did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, Computer Center Records

did.abstract: The collection contains administrative files for the computer center at the .

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: Computer support and services at the University of Connecticut houses the servers and other large-scale hardware, computer labs, production facilities with appropriate staff to serve the overall computing and information technology needs of the University. Originally called the Computer Center, this operation is now identified as University Information Services (UITS) and is located in the Gant Math Science Complex. Information about their services and policies can be found on their website.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains administrative files for the computer center at the University of Connecticut.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: [Subjects include: Computer services for teaching and research.]
